reviews.title: Not 2 Bad...
reviews.comment: Only thing that bugs the hell outta me is when ur getting ready to shoot the ball its hard to tell what color it is.. especially with the light and dark blue.  Please fix and use non similar colors please and ill rate 5.
reviews.author: Sarah Lynn
